page.title: 10INTERVIEW cont.
page.content: Some of the farm buildingssurrounding the farmyard are very old and were built with stones from the quarry that lies on the farm.The loft of one building was the original meeting place of the local baptists before a chapel called GLANDWR(at the waterside)was built nearby in 1894.New buildings have been added,including a modern milking shed where the milk is being piped to a tank before being collected daily by milk tanker lorries. One labourer is employed on the farm and Mr Phillips approves of modern machinery and technology which makes farming easier and more efficient;the first tractor was purchased in 1938
